clarified_request:
Original Request: I would like to understand when to use AI Agents, vs other systems?

Clarifications:
- Are you interested in specific applications or industries where AI Agents are used?: No, general overview
- Would you like examples or case studies demonstrating when AI Agents are preferable?: Yes, detailed examples
- Are there particular types of systems (e.g., rule-based, automation software) you want to compare AI Agents against?: No, general comparison
- Do you have a specific goal or problem you are trying to solve with these systems?: No, just general knowledge

subtasks.title: Define AI Agents and Other Systems
subtasks.objective: Establish clear definitions and characteristics of AI Agents and other relevant systems (e.g., rule-based, automation software).
subtasks.scope: Literature review and conceptual analysis of AI Agents and comparable systems.

subtasks.title: Identify Criteria for Usage of AI Agents vs Other Systems
subtasks.objective: Determine the key factors, scenarios, or conditions that influence when AI Agents are preferable over other systems.
subtasks.scope: Analysis of system capabilities, limitations, and typical use cases based on existing research.

subtasks.title: Gather and Analyze Examples and Case Studies
subtasks.objective: Collect detailed real-world examples and case studies illustrating when AI Agents are advantageous.
subtasks.scope: Selection of diverse examples demonstrating different contexts and decision points.

subtasks.title: Compare AI Agents with Other Systems
subtasks.objective: Create a comprehensive comparison highlighting strengths, weaknesses, and suitability scenarios of AI Agents versus other systems.
subtasks.scope: General comparison based on capabilities, performance, flexibility, and application contexts.

subtasks.title: Synthesize Findings and Draft Overview
subtasks.objective: Integrate all insights into a clear, concise overview answering 'when to use AI Agents vs other systems'.
subtasks.scope: Summarization and synthesis of definitions, criteria, examples, and comparisons.

key_information: AI Web Agents automate long-tail knowledge work by integrating web tools and data sources.
Agents can perform web scraping, data extraction, and market research autonomously.
Characteristics include autonomy, flexibility, and integration with web-based tools.
insights: AI agents extend beyond simple APIs, functioning as autonomous entities capable of complex tasks.
They are instrumental in automating knowledge-intensive workflows.
quotes: AI web agents are transforming knowledge work by automating tasks traditionally done manually.
connections: Provides context for AI agent capabilities beyond rule-based systems.
Links to automation and intelligent data extraction discussed in other documents.

clarification_data.original_query:
Generate 3-5 targeted questions that would help clarify:
- Specific aspects or examples they're interested in
- Desired depth of information (examples, case studies, statistics)
- Intended use or application of the research
- Any constraints or preferences

query_analysis.main_topic: Clarifying research needs for targeted questions
implicit_needs: Determining the desired level of detail
Identifying the purpose of the research
ambiguities: Type of research or subject matter
Audience or context for the questions
Scope and depth of information desired

clarifying_questions.question: What specific topics or examples are you most interested in exploring?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To identify the focus areas or subjects of interest

clarifying_questions.question: How in-depth do you want the information to be (e.g., brief overview, detailed case studies, comprehensive analysis)?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To determine the level of detail required

clarifying_questions.question: What is the intended use or application of this research (e.g., report, presentation, strategic planning)?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To understand how the research will be utilized

clarifying_questions.question: Are there any specific constraints or preferences I should be aware of (e.g., time frame, data sources, geographic focus)?
clarifying_questions.purpose: To identify any limitations or particular requirements

clarification_data.suggested_refinement: Please specify the main topic or subject area you are researching to help tailor the questions more effectively.
